page.title: 11TRADE
page.content:
TRADE SHOPPING SURVEY. WE ASKED 11 PEOPLE HOW LONG THEY HAD BEEN LIVING IN PORTISHEAD. IT RANGED FROM 10 TO 63 YEARS. WE ASKED SOME PEOPLE WHAT THEY THOUGHT OF THE SHOPS TODAY.SOME PEOPLE THOUGHT THEY WERE OKAY, OTHERS THOUGHT THEY ARE TOO EXPENSIVE. WE ASKED 11 PEOPLE WHAT THEIR THREE FAVOURITE SHOPS WERE. HERE ARE THE ANSWERS. CHOICE 1 CHOICE 2 CHOICE 3
GATEWAY INTERNATIONAL MARKET GATEWAY DEREK PAIN GET FRESH GATEWAY INTERNATIONAL BAKERS GATEWAY INTERNATIONAL GET FRESH GATEWAY INTERNATIONAL GET FRESH BANK INTERNATIONAL CAR SHOP RAGS BEAUTY BAZZAR FREEMANS INTERNATIONAL DEREK PAIN VINYARD
